document.full_text: mentor graphics corp said a takeover proposal by its biggest shareholder carl icahn undervalues the company, and this is not the time to put the chip-design software maker up for sale.
document.title: mentor graphics says icahn offer undervalues company
lines_and_colors: mentor graphics corp said a takeover proposal by its biggest shareholder carl icahn undervalues the company, and this is not the time to put the chip-design software maker up for sale.
